## Power Analysis

### One-way ANOVA

```{r}
library(pwr)
```

We want to make a plot of sample size to power for effect size .25, significance level .05 with 5 groups.

```{r}
n <- 2:45
power <- lapply(n, function(x) pwr.anova.test(k=5,n=x,f=.25,sig.level=.05)$power)
plot(n,power,type="b")
```
